abilities.name: War Stance
abilities.details:
Mars generates a stack of War Stance for each enemy hero damaged by his basic attacks and abilities, lasting for few seconds (maximum 10 stacks).

Each War Stance stack gains Mars bonus physical power (scaling with physical power). At maximum stacks, the physical power bonus is doubled.

abilities.name: Dominion
abilities.details:
Mars slams the axe to the ground to create a fissure in a straight line, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to all enemies hit and briefly slowing them.

At maximum War Stance stacks, the range and slow effect are increased.

abilities.name: Onslaught
abilities.details:
Mars gains increased attack speed and movement speed for a duration. In addition, his basic attacks cleave in a cone, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to all enemies hit.

At maximum War Stance stacks, Mars heals for a percentage of the cleave damage dealt to enemy heroes.

abilities.name: Omen
abilities.details:
Mars dashes to a target direction. Dash distance is increased when cast towards an enemy hero, but decreased when cast away from enemy heroes.

Upon arrival, Mars spins his axe around, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to all nearby enemies.

At maximum War Stance stacks, Mars shreds the physical resistance of all enemies hit.

abilities.name: Conqueror
abilities.details:
Mars releases a powerful roar, fearing all nearby enemies and greatly slowing their movement speed for a duration.

Mars also gains maximum War Stance stacks upon casting this ability.
